LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.label: bullgor
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.description: Minotaurs, also known as Bullgors, are a massive bull-headed breed of the Beastmen race. Having a large body restricts their use of certain apparel.
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.tools.3.label: right horn
LanguageData.Alien_Bullgor.tools.4.label: left horn
LanguageData.Alien_Gor.label: gor
LanguageData.Alien_Gor.description: A common breed of the Beastmen. They make up the bulk of the beastmen herds roaming the lands. Gors tend to be vicious and bloodthirsty, but the rarer beastwomen tends to have a gentler side.
LanguageData.Alien_Gor.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Gor.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Gor.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Ungor.label: ungor
LanguageData.Alien_Ungor.description: A lower breed of beastmen. They are either born as mutants or changed into ones later in their lifes. Outcasts from human society they turn to the gor herds as a lower cast.
LanguageData.Alien_Ungor.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Ungor.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Ungor.tools.2.label: teeth
